title: W8 am I suppoaed to get something at 4th Mastery Point?

replies.body: Not 100% sure if you get anything other then this but I know that you definitely get a goldish yellow ribbon with the level 4 mastery emblem over the left side of your loading boarder. This is then red with the level 5 mastery symbol when you hit 5.

Yes

edit: when you get a kill

Again, i am not 100% sure. I myself have not seen one on any enemy borders, yet ive seen plenty on my team. As for the in-game scoreboard ribbon, i have no idea seeing as though i only just found out there is one in-game as well.

> [{quoted}](name=JnrSoldier,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=v682fhF4,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-06-04T00:23:38.155+0000)
>
> Not 100% sure if you get anything other then this but I know that you definitely get a goldish yellow ribbon with the level 4 mastery emblem over the left side of your loading boarder. This is then red with the level 5 mastery symbol when you hit 5.

Also when you hit tab and get a kill it shows the ribbon

At level 4 you unlock in the in-game emote (ctrl+6) to show off your mastery level.
You also get a little icon on your load screen border.

These things as of right now are only visible to teammates, however next patch they should be visible to the enemy too.
